tests.test_email_validator moduleÔÉÅ

Email Validator Module Test Suite

Comprehensive test coverage for utils/email_validator.py module including: - Domain restriction functionality - Environment variable handling - Valid and invalid email domain checking - Configuration scenarios - Edge cases and error handling - Logging verification
